content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":261712,"originalJapaneseLine":"特殊な部屋、丁重に保管されている肉塊を発見します","translatedEnglishLine":"A special room, where carefully preserved chunks of flesh are discovered."},{"lineNumber":261713,"originalJapaneseLine":"きもっ・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Gross..."},{"lineNumber":261714,"originalJapaneseLine":"びくびくしている、これまだ生きているのか","translatedEnglishLine":"It's trembling, is it still alive?"},{"lineNumber":261715,"originalJapaneseLine":"工場の作業場に着く、オートメーション制作となっている","translatedEnglishLine":"Arriving at the factory workshop, it is fully automated production."},{"lineNumber":261716,"originalJapaneseLine":"パイアールの作った設計図を元に制作しているのは、工場長ファナック","translatedEnglishLine":"The factory manager Fanack is producing based on the blueprints made by Piarl."},{"lineNumber":261717,"originalJapaneseLine":"ＰＩ３が数台、量産ラインに乗せられている","translatedEnglishLine":"Several PI3 units are on the mass production line."},{"lineNumber":261718,"originalJapaneseLine":"イメージ：千と千尋の蜘蛛じじい","translatedEnglishLine":"Image: The spider old man from Spirited Away."},{"lineNumber":261719,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦闘になります","translatedEnglishLine":"A battle begins."},{"lineNumber":261720,"originalJapaneseLine":"ファナックは壊れ生産工場は止まります。","translatedEnglishLine":"Fanack is destroyed, and the production factory stops."},{"lineNumber":261721,"originalJapaneseLine":"完成済みだが未稼働だったＰＩ３も破壊します","translatedEnglishLine":"The completed but not yet operational PI3 units are also destroyed."},{"lineNumber":261722,"originalJapaneseLine":"そこにパイアールが戻ってきます","translatedEnglishLine":"Piarl then returns."},{"lineNumber":261723,"originalJapaneseLine":"ひどいなぁ・・　なんで入ってこれたんだ","translatedEnglishLine":"That's terrible... How did you get in here?"},{"lineNumber":261724,"originalJapaneseLine":"あっ、そっか・・迎撃システムを稼働させるの忘れていた","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, right... I forgot to activate the defense system."},{"lineNumber":261725,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスが斬りかかる、魔人なので無敵とたかをくっていたパイアール","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance strikes; Piarl had assumed he was invincible because he is a demon."},{"lineNumber":261726,"originalJapaneseLine":"斬られてしまう、えっ・・なんで、そっか、君がカオスマスターか","translatedEnglishLine":"He is cut. Huh... why? Oh, you are the Chaos Master."},{"lineNumber":261727,"originalJapaneseLine":"面倒な存在だな・・始末した方がいいね","translatedEnglishLine":"You're a troublesome presence... better to finish you off."},{"lineNumber":261728,"originalJapaneseLine":"何か赤外線端末みたいなのをランスにあてる（情報を取得する）","translatedEnglishLine":"He puts something like an infrared terminal on Lance (to acquire information)."},{"lineNumber":261729,"originalJapaneseLine":"ちょっと待て、今なにをした","translatedEnglishLine":"Wait a minute, what did you just do?"},{"lineNumber":261730,"originalJapaneseLine":"何もしてないよ、君のパーソナル情報を取得しただけ、ターゲットに登録する為にね","translatedEnglishLine":"I didn't do anything, I just obtained your personal information to register you as a target."},{"lineNumber":261731,"originalJapaneseLine":"そして部屋から出て行く。","translatedEnglishLine":"Then he leaves the room."},{"lineNumber":261732,"originalJapaneseLine":"あっ、まてと追いかけるが分厚い扉で開ける事が出来ない","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, wait! I chase after him but can't open the heavy door."},{"lineNumber":261733,"originalJapaneseLine":"その後、工場内は出口へ続く道以外は扉が閉められており、出る以外道が無かった。","translatedEnglishLine":"After that, all doors inside the factory except the path to the exit are closed; there was no other way out."},{"lineNumber":261734,"originalJapaneseLine":"しかたなく外に出ます","translatedEnglishLine":"I have no choice but to go outside."},{"lineNumber":261735,"originalJapaneseLine":"Ｍランド、地下牢、夜","translatedEnglishLine":"M-Land, underground prison, night."},{"lineNumber":261736,"originalJapaneseLine":"危険な女カチューシャがここに捕らわれている","translatedEnglishLine":"The dangerous woman Katyusha is imprisoned here."},{"lineNumber":261737,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスは何度か訪れて抱いた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance has visited several times and embraced her."},{"lineNumber":261738,"originalJapaneseLine":"だが、カチューシャは危険なままであり、放つ事は出来なかった","translatedEnglishLine":"However, Katyusha remains dangerous, so he could not release her."},{"lineNumber":261739,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":261740,"originalJapaneseLine":"私は貴方たちに支配化にならないわよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"I will never become your subordinate."},{"lineNumber":261741,"originalJapaneseLine":"不愉快なら殺したらいいのに、殺せば？","translatedEnglishLine":"If I'm unpleasant, then just kill me. Why don't you?"},{"lineNumber":261742,"originalJapaneseLine":"ふん、その手には乗るか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmph, I won't fall for that..."},{"lineNumber":261743,"originalJapaneseLine":"お前が死ねば、お前が率いていた世界最大の裏組織ＤＸの会は","translatedEnglishLine":"If you die, the DX Society, the world's largest underworld organization you led,"},{"lineNumber":261744,"originalJapaneseLine":"新たなボスを決める事が出来て組織だって俺達に反抗してくるだろう","translatedEnglishLine":"will be able to appoint a new boss and the organization will likely rebel against us."},{"lineNumber":261745,"originalJapaneseLine":"今は、お前が捕らえられているからボスの命令が無く奴らは動けない","translatedEnglishLine":"Right now, since you are captured, without the boss's orders, they can't act."},{"lineNumber":261746,"originalJapaneseLine":"ま、人類が力を合わせて魔物のと戦わないといけない時に裏社会が","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, at a time when humanity must unite to fight monsters, the underworld"},{"lineNumber":261747,"originalJapaneseLine":"協力的でないというだけでだいぶ困ってはいるんだがな。","translatedEnglishLine":"not cooperating is causing us quite a bit of trouble."},{"lineNumber":261748,"originalJapaneseLine":"それでもこちらに敵対するよりかはマシだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Still, it's better than having them oppose us outright."},{"lineNumber":261749,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":261750,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　このあたり、カチューシャとの話ではなく、参謀本部との会話でもいいかな","translatedEnglishLine":"Around here, instead of talking with Katyusha, maybe this can be treated as a conversation with the general staff headquarters."},{"lineNumber":261751,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　重要な要点","translatedEnglishLine":"Important points:"},{"lineNumber":261752,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　１．カチューシャはコントロール出来ない","translatedEnglishLine":"1. Katyusha cannot be controlled."},{"lineNumber":261753,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　２．裏社会を牛耳るＤＸの会にも、協力してもらわないといけないが、今は協力が得られていない","translatedEnglishLine":"2. We must have cooperation from the DX Society that controls the underworld, but currently they are not cooperating."},{"lineNumber":261754,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　３．カチューシャを殺すと、きっと敵対する","translatedEnglishLine":"3. If Katyusha is killed, they will certainly become hostile."},{"lineNumber":261755,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":261756,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスは何かうまくやって　デラックスブックでカチューシャと契約する","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance manages something skillfully and makes a contract with Katyusha using the Deluxe Book."},{"lineNumber":261757,"originalJapaneseLine":"契約内容は対等で無いと受理されない、ここがポイント","translatedEnglishLine":"The contract must be equal to be accepted; this is the key point."},{"lineNumber":261758,"originalJapaneseLine":"　何か後で考える","translatedEnglishLine":"I'll think about something later."},{"lineNumber":261759,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":261760,"originalJapaneseLine":"これにより、ランスは　カチューシャとＤＸの会を牛耳る事が出来るようになる","translatedEnglishLine":"Because of this, Lance will be able to control both Katyusha and the DX Society."},{"lineNumber":261761,"originalJapaneseLine":"Ｍランド、司令部","translatedEnglishLine":"M-Land, Headquarters."},{"lineNumber":261762,"originalJapaneseLine":"自由都市連合軍の将軍セシル、コパンドンとかと軍の配置やいろいろ話をしている","translatedEnglishLine":"General Cecil of the Free Cities Alliance Army is discussing troop placements and various matters with Kopandon and others."},{"lineNumber":261763,"originalJapaneseLine":"他の都市長も少し入れてもいい","translatedEnglishLine":"Other city governors may also be included a little."},{"lineNumber":261764,"originalJapaneseLine":"セシルはすっかり自信を取り戻しており、また他の者からの信頼もより厚くなっていた","translatedEnglishLine":"Cecil has completely regained his confidence and gained even more trust from others."},{"lineNumber":261765,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスが口説く、まだ勇者を追っているのか、あいつクズだぞ。何度来ても俺が撃退している","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance teases him: Are you still chasing the hero? That guy's a scumbag. No matter how many times he comes, I always repel him."},{"lineNumber":261766,"originalJapaneseLine":"この世界の危機に、魔人側についているとしか思えん、人類の裏切り者だ","translatedEnglishLine":"In this world's crisis, he can only be siding with the demons—he's a traitor to humanity."},{"lineNumber":261767,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・・何か訳があると思っている、私は彼を信じている","translatedEnglishLine":"...I think there is some reason behind it; I believe in him."},{"lineNumber":261768,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":261769,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスの部屋、おのれ勇者アリオスめ","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance's room, Damn you, Hero Arios!"},{"lineNumber":261770,"originalJapaneseLine":"そこランスが怒る所じゃないでしょ。","translatedEnglishLine":"That's not the place to get angry, Lance."},{"lineNumber":261771,"originalJapaneseLine":"ん・・しかし、確か何年か前に勇者アリオスと地下帝国で戦った際・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm... but if I recall correctly, some years ago when I fought Hero Arios in the underground empire..."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 特殊な部屋、丁重に保管されている肉塊を発見します
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A special room, where carefully preserved chunks of flesh are discovered.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: きもっ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gross...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: びくびくしている、これまだ生きているのか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's trembling, is it still alive?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 工場の作業場に着く、オートメーション制作となっている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arriving at the factory workshop, it is fully automated production.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パイアールの作った設計図を元に制作しているのは、工場長ファナック
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The factory manager Fanack is producing based on the blueprints made by Piarl.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＰＩ３が数台、量産ラインに乗せられている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Several PI3 units are on the mass production line.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: イメージ：千と千尋の蜘蛛じじい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Image: The spider old man from Spirited Away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘になります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A battle begins.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ファナックは壊れ生産工場は止まります。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Fanack is destroyed, and the production factory stops.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 完成済みだが未稼働だったＰＩ３も破壊します
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The completed but not yet operational PI3 units are also destroyed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこにパイアールが戻ってきます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Piarl then returns.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひどいなぁ・・　なんで入ってこれたんだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's terrible... How did you get in here?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっ、そっか・・迎撃システムを稼働させるの忘れていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, right... I forgot to activate the defense system.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが斬りかかる、魔人なので無敵とたかをくっていたパイアール
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance strikes; Piarl had assumed he was invincible because he is a demon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 斬られてしまう、えっ・・なんで、そっか、君がカオスマスターか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He is cut. Huh... why? Oh, you are the Chaos Master.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 面倒な存在だな・・始末した方がいいね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You're a troublesome presence... better to finish you off.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何か赤外線端末みたいなのをランスにあてる（情報を取得する）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He puts something like an infrared terminal on Lance (to acquire information).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっと待て、今なにをした
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wait a minute, what did you just do?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何もしてないよ、君のパーソナル情報を取得しただけ、ターゲットに登録する為にね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I didn't do anything, I just obtained your personal information to register you as a target.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして部屋から出て行く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then he leaves the room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっ、まてと追いかけるが分厚い扉で開ける事が出来ない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, wait! I chase after him but can't open the heavy door.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その後、工場内は出口へ続く道以外は扉が閉められており、出る以外道が無かった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After that, all doors inside the factory except the path to the exit are closed; there was no other way out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかたなく外に出ます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I have no choice but to go outside.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: Ｍランド、地下牢、夜
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: M-Land, underground prison, night.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 危険な女カチューシャがここに捕らわれている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The dangerous woman Katyusha is imprisoned here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは何度か訪れて抱いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance has visited several times and embraced her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、カチューシャは危険なままであり、放つ事は出来なかった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, Katyusha remains dangerous, so he could not release her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私は貴方たちに支配化にならないわよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will never become your subordinate.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 不愉快なら殺したらいいのに、殺せば？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If I'm unpleasant, then just kill me. Why don't you?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふん、その手には乗るか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmph, I won't fall for that...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前が死ねば、お前が率いていた世界最大の裏組織ＤＸの会は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you die, the DX Society, the world's largest underworld organization you led,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 新たなボスを決める事が出来て組織だって俺達に反抗してくるだろう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: will be able to appoint a new boss and the organization will likely rebel against us.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今は、お前が捕らえられているからボスの命令が無く奴らは動けない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Right now, since you are captured, without the boss's orders, they can't act.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ま、人類が力を合わせて魔物のと戦わないといけない時に裏社会が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, at a time when humanity must unite to fight monsters, the underworld

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 協力的でないというだけでだいぶ困ってはいるんだがな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: not cooperating is causing us quite a bit of trouble.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それでもこちらに敵対するよりかはマシだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Still, it's better than having them oppose us outright.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このあたり、カチューシャとの話ではなく、参謀本部との会話でもいいかな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Around here, instead of talking with Katyusha, maybe this can be treated as a conversation with the general staff headquarters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 重要な要点
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Important points:

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: １．カチューシャはコントロール出来ない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 1. Katyusha cannot be controlled.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ２．裏社会を牛耳るＤＸの会にも、協力してもらわないといけないが、今は協力が得られていない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 2. We must have cooperation from the DX Society that controls the underworld, but currently they are not cooperating.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ３．カチューシャを殺すと、きっと敵対する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 3. If Katyusha is killed, they will certainly become hostile.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは何かうまくやって　デラックスブックでカチューシャと契約する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance manages something skillfully and makes a contract with Katyusha using the Deluxe Book.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 契約内容は対等で無いと受理されない、ここがポイント
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The contract must be equal to be accepted; this is the key point.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何か後で考える
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll think about something later.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これにより、ランスは　カチューシャとＤＸの会を牛耳る事が出来るようになる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because of this, Lance will be able to control both Katyusha and the DX Society.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: Ｍランド、司令部
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: M-Land, Headquarters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市連合軍の将軍セシル、コパンドンとかと軍の配置やいろいろ話をしている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: General Cecil of the Free Cities Alliance Army is discussing troop placements and various matters with Kopandon and others.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 他の都市長も少し入れてもいい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Other city governors may also be included a little.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: セシルはすっかり自信を取り戻しており、また他の者からの信頼もより厚くなっていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cecil has completely regained his confidence and gained even more trust from others.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが口説く、まだ勇者を追っているのか、あいつクズだぞ。何度来ても俺が撃退している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance teases him: Are you still chasing the hero? That guy's a scumbag. No matter how many times he comes, I always repel him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この世界の危機に、魔人側についているとしか思えん、人類の裏切り者だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In this world's crisis, he can only be siding with the demons—he's a traitor to humanity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・・何か訳があると思っている、私は彼を信じている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...I think there is some reason behind it; I believe in him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの部屋、おのれ勇者アリオスめ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance's room, Damn you, Hero Arios!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこランスが怒る所じゃないでしょ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's not the place to get angry, Lance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ん・・しかし、確か何年か前に勇者アリオスと地下帝国で戦った際・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm... but if I recall correctly, some years ago when I fought Hero Arios in the underground empire...

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

I chase after him but can't open the heavy door."},{"lineNumber":261733,"originalJapaneseLine":"その後、工場内は出口へ続く道以外は扉が閉められており、出る以外道が無かった。","translatedEnglishLine":"After that, all doors inside the factory except the path to the exit are closed; there was no other way out."},{"lineNumber":261734,"originalJapaneseLine":"しかたなく外に出ます","translatedEnglishLine":"I have no choice but to go outside."},{"lineNumber":261735,"originalJapaneseLine":"Ｍランド、地下牢、夜","translatedEnglishLine":"M-Land, underground prison, night."},{"lineNumber":261736,"originalJapaneseLine":"危険な女カチューシャがここに捕らわれている","translatedEnglishLine":"The dangerous woman Katyusha is imprisoned here."},{"lineNumber":261737,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスは何度か訪れて抱いた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance has visited several times and embraced her."},{"lineNumber":261738,"originalJapaneseLine":"だが、カチューシャは危険なままであり、放つ事は出来なかった","translatedEnglishLine":"However, Katyusha remains dangerous, so he could not release her."},{"lineNumber":261739,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":261740,"originalJapaneseLine":"私は貴方たちに支配化にならないわよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"I will never become your subordinate."},{"lineNumber":261741,"originalJapaneseLine":"不愉快なら殺したらいいのに、殺せば？","translatedEnglishLine":"If I'm unpleasant, then just kill me. Katyusha cannot be controlled."},{"lineNumber":261753,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　２．裏社会を牛耳るＤＸの会にも、協力してもらわないといけないが、今は協力が得られていない","translatedEnglishLine":"2. translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 特殊な部屋、丁重に保管されている肉塊を発見します
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A special room, where carefully preserved chunks of flesh are discovered.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: きもっ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gross...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: びくびくしている、これまだ生きているのか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's trembling, is it still alive?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 工場の作業場に着く、オートメーション制作となっている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arriving at the factory workshop, it is fully automated production.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パイアールの作った設計図を元に制作しているのは、工場長ファナック
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The factory manager Fanack is producing based on the blueprints made by Piarl.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＰＩ３が数台、量産ラインに乗せられている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Several PI3 units are on the mass production line.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: イメージ：千と千尋の蜘蛛じじい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Image: The spider old man from Spirited Away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘になります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A battle begins.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ファナックは壊れ生産工場は止まります。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Fanack is destroyed, and the production factory stops.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 完成済みだが未稼働だったＰＩ３も破壊します
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The completed but not yet operational PI3 units are also destroyed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこにパイアールが戻ってきます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Piarl then returns.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひどいなぁ・・　なんで入ってこれたんだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's terrible... How did you get in here?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっ、そっか・・迎撃システムを稼働させるの忘れていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, right... I forgot to activate the defense system.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが斬りかかる、魔人なので無敵とたかをくっていたパイアール
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance strikes; Piarl had assumed he was invincible because he is a demon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 斬られてしまう、えっ・・なんで、そっか、君がカオスマスターか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He is cut. Huh... why? Oh, you are the Chaos Master.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 面倒な存在だな・・始末した方がいいね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You're a troublesome presence... better to finish you off.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何か赤外線端末みたいなのをランスにあてる（情報を取得する）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He puts something like an infrared terminal on Lance (to acquire information).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっと待て、今なにをした
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wait a minute, what did you just do?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何もしてないよ、君のパーソナル情報を取得しただけ、ターゲットに登録する為にね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I didn't do anything, I just obtained your personal information to register you as a target.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして部屋から出て行く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then he leaves the room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっ、まてと追いかけるが分厚い扉で開ける事が出来ない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, wait! I chase after him but can't open the heavy door.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その後、工場内は出口へ続く道以外は扉が閉められており、出る以外道が無かった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After that, all doors inside the factory except the path to the exit are closed; there was no other way out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかたなく外に出ます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I have no choice but to go outside.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: Ｍランド、地下牢、夜
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: M-Land, underground prison, night.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 危険な女カチューシャがここに捕らわれている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The dangerous woman Katyusha is imprisoned here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは何度か訪れて抱いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance has visited several times and embraced her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、カチューシャは危険なままであり、放つ事は出来なかった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, Katyusha remains dangerous, so he could not release her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私は貴方たちに支配化にならないわよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will never become your subordinate.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 不愉快なら殺したらいいのに、殺せば？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If I'm unpleasant, then just kill me. Why don't you?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふん、その手には乗るか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmph, I won't fall for that...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前が死ねば、お前が率いていた世界最大の裏組織ＤＸの会は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you die, the DX Society, the world's largest underworld organization you led,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 新たなボスを決める事が出来て組織だって俺達に反抗してくるだろう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: will be able to appoint a new boss and the organization will likely rebel against us.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今は、お前が捕らえられているからボスの命令が無く奴らは動けない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Right now, since you are captured, without the boss's orders, they can't act.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ま、人類が力を合わせて魔物のと戦わないといけない時に裏社会が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, at a time when humanity must unite to fight monsters, the underworld

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 協力的でないというだけでだいぶ困ってはいるんだがな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: not cooperating is causing us quite a bit of trouble.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それでもこちらに敵対するよりかはマシだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Still, it's better than having them oppose us outright.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このあたり、カチューシャとの話ではなく、参謀本部との会話でもいいかな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Around here, instead of talking with Katyusha, maybe this can be treated as a conversation with the general staff headquarters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 重要な要点
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Important points:

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: １．カチューシャはコントロール出来ない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 1. Katyusha cannot be controlled.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ２．裏社会を牛耳るＤＸの会にも、協力してもらわないといけないが、今は協力が得られていない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 2. We must have cooperation from the DX Society that controls the underworld, but currently they are not cooperating.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ３．カチューシャを殺すと、きっと敵対する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 3. If Katyusha is killed, they will certainly become hostile.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは何かうまくやって　デラックスブックでカチューシャと契約する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance manages something skillfully and makes a contract with Katyusha using the Deluxe Book.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 契約内容は対等で無いと受理されない、ここがポイント
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The contract must be equal to be accepted; this is the key point.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何か後で考える
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll think about something later.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これにより、ランスは　カチューシャとＤＸの会を牛耳る事が出来るようになる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because of this, Lance will be able to control both Katyusha and the DX Society.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: Ｍランド、司令部
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: M-Land, Headquarters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市連合軍の将軍セシル、コパンドンとかと軍の配置やいろいろ話をしている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: General Cecil of the Free Cities Alliance Army is discussing troop placements and various matters with Kopandon and others.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 他の都市長も少し入れてもいい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Other city governors may also be included a little.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: セシルはすっかり自信を取り戻しており、また他の者からの信頼もより厚くなっていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cecil has completely regained his confidence and gained even more trust from others.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが口説く、まだ勇者を追っているのか、あいつクズだぞ。何度来ても俺が撃退している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance teases him: Are you still chasing the hero? That guy's a scumbag. No matter how many times he comes, I always repel him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この世界の危機に、魔人側についているとしか思えん、人類の裏切り者だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In this world's crisis, he can only be siding with the demons—he's a traitor to humanity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・・何か訳があると思っている、私は彼を信じている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...I think there is some reason behind it; I believe in him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの部屋、おのれ勇者アリオスめ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance's room, Damn you, Hero Arios!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこランスが怒る所じゃないでしょ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's not the place to get angry, Lance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ん・・しかし、確か何年か前に勇者アリオスと地下帝国で戦った際・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm... but if I recall correctly, some years ago when I fought Hero Arios in the underground empire...
